name: Farmin' Ohio
description:
Farmin' Ohio

Oh, what fun it is to farm in Ohio!
Protect your crops and livestock from the raccoons, bears, wolves, the weather, and zombies, and don't let them die.

Your survival is hinged upon those crops and livestock.

How long can you last?

The leaderboard was made using Lootlocker, If it doesn't work then oops.

TIPS:

Weather doesn't usually appear until day 2.

Zombies don't appear until night.

Raccoons, Wolves, and Bears can appear whenever they'd like.
